Procedure.name: setupCCC
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=CCC receiversSetup=CCC bck=initialize=CCC bck=setSection=0,*,730.0,*,*,*,* bck=setSection=1,*,730.0,*,*,*,* device=0 calOff

Procedure.name: setupKKC
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=KKC receiversSetup=KKC receiversMode=SINGLEDISH bck=initialize=KKC device=10 calOff
